section.p: You tell the guard your name. He recognizes you and explains that Avar Hordeth is not at home, but your room is set aside for you as promised. You can leave possessions and money here to save having to carry them around with you. You can also rest here safely and recover any Stamina points you have lost. Record in the box anything you wish to leave.

outcomes.outcome: A thief. Lose one possession (your choice) if any, that you left here

section.p: You can return to Yarimura by turning to 10.
